name: Articuno
effect: (This card cannot be used at official tournaments.)
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

attacks.name: Freeze-Dry
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. If tails, this attack also does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
